languages.text: "Уже исполнено, Ваша Светлость. Пару лет назад я раздобыл вещь, изготовленную для деспотессы планеты Колгор Альфа. Особое платье для особого случая, я знал, что не зря хранил его".

"Already done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A couple of years ago I happened to procure something that was made for the despotess of Colgor Alpha. A unique dress for a unique occasion, you might say. I knew I kept it for a reason."
languages.original_text: "Уже исполнено, Ваша Светлость. Пару лет назад я раздобыл вещь, изготовленную для деспотессы планеты Колгор Альфа. Особое платье для особого случая, я знал, что не зря хранил его".

traits.locale_text: "Already done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A couple of years ago I happened to procure something that was made for the despotess of Colgor Alpha. A unique dress for a unique occasion, might I say. I knew I kept it for a reason."

"Already done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A couple of years ago I happened to procure something that was made for the despotess of Colgor Alpha. A unique dress for a unique occasion, might I say. I knew I kept it for a reason."

"Already done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A couple of years ago I happened to procure something that was made for the despotess of Colgor Alpha. A unique dress for a unique occasion, you might say. I knew I kept it for a reason."

"Already done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A couple of years ago I happened to procure something that was made for the despotess of Colgor Alpha. A unique dress for a unique occasion, you might say. I knew I kept it for a reason."

languages.text: "Ist bereits erledigt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich habe vor einigen Jahren etwas erhalten, das für die Despotin von Colgor Alpha angefertigt wurde. Ein einzigartiges Kleid für einen einzigartigen Anlass, könnte man sagen. Ich wusste, es würde sich lohnen, es aufzuheben."
languages.original_text: "Already done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A couple of years ago I happened to procure something that was made for the despotess of Colgor Alpha. A unique dress for a unique occasion, you might say. I knew I kept it for a reason."

traits.locale_text: "Ist bereits erledigt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich habe vor einigen Jahren etwas erhalten, das für die Despotin von Colgor Alpha angefertigt wurde. Ein einzigartiges Kleid für einen einzigartigen Anlass, könnte man sagen. Ich wusste, es würde sich lohnen, es aufzuheben."

languages.text: « C'est déjà fait, Votre Seigneurie. Voilà quelques années, je m'étais justement procuré une robe confectionnée spécialement pour la despote de Colgor Alpha. Une tenue unique pour une occasion unique, en quelque sorte. Je savais que j'avais bien fait de la garder. »
languages.original_text: "Already done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A couple of years ago I happened to procure something that was made for the despotess of Colgor Alpha. A unique dress for a unique occasion, you might say. I knew I kept it for a reason."

traits.locale_text: « C'est déjà fait, Votre Seigneurie. Voilà quelques années, je m'étais justement procuré une robe confectionnée spécialement pour la despote de Colgor Alpha. Une tenue unique pour une occasion unique, en quelque sorte. Je savais que j'avais bien fait de la garder. »

languages.text: “这件事情已经办好了，大人。几年前，我偶然得到了一件华服，是为科尔戈阿尔法星的女霸主准备的。可以说，这是件独一无二的华服，适合独一无二的场合。我当时就知道，这件礼服日后一定会派上用场。”
languages.original_text: "Already done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A couple of years ago I happened to procure something that was made for the despotess of Colgor Alpha. A unique dress for a unique occasion, you might say. I knew I kept it for a reason."

traits.locale_text: “这件事情已经办好了，大人。几年前，我偶然得到了一件华服，是为科尔戈阿尔法星的女霸主准备的。可以说，这是件独一无二的华服，适合独一无二的场合。我当时就知道，这件礼服日后一定会派上用场。”

languages.text: 「陛下、すでにご用意があります。数年前、偶然コルガー・アルファの独裁者用に仕立てられた品を手に入れましてな。ユニークな場で使う、ユニークなドレス、とでも言いましょうか。こんなこともあろうかと、とっておいたのです」
languages.original_text: "Already done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A couple of years ago I happened to procure something that was made for the despotess of Colgor Alpha. A unique dress for a unique occasion, you might say. I knew I kept it for a reason."

traits.locale_text: 「既にご用意があります、陛下。数年前、偶然コルガー・アルファの独裁者用に作られた品を手に入れましてな。ユニークな場で使う、ユニークなドレス、とでも言いましょうか。こんなこともあろうかと、とっておいたのです」

languages.text: «Ya está hecho, {mf|milord|milady}. Hace unos años, encontré una prenda que se había confeccionado para la déspota de Colgor Alpha. Diría que es un vestido único que sirve para cualquier ocasión. Sabía que hacía bien guardándolo».
languages.original_text: "Already done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A couple of years ago I happened to procure something that was made for the despotess of Colgor Alpha. A unique dress for a unique occasion, you might say. I knew I kept it for a reason."

traits.locale_text: «Ya está hecho, {mf|milord|milady}. Hace unos años, encontré una prenda que se había confeccionado para la déspota de Colgor Alpha. Diría que es un vestido único que sirve para cualquier ocasión. Sabía que hacía bien guardándolo».

languages.text: "Buldum bile {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Birkaç yıl önce, Colgor Alfa tiranı için hazırlanan bir elbise geçmişti elime. Eşsiz durumlara özel eşsiz bir elbise... Boşuna saklamadığımı biliyordum."
languages.original_text: "Already done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A couple of years ago I happened to procure something that was made for the despotess of Colgor Alpha. A unique dress for a unique occasion, you might say. I knew I kept it for a reason."

traits.locale_text: "Buldum bile {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Birkaç yıl önce, Colgor Alfa tiranı için hazırlanan bir elbise geçmişti elime. Eşsiz durumlara özel eşsiz bir elbise... Boşuna saklamadığımı biliyordum."
